body.description: SheaMoisture African Black Soap Soothing Body Lotion is a moisturizing lotion made with vitamins and is the best body lotion for dry skin. This body lotion for women is a paraben-free body lotion by SheaMoisture. This skin moisturizer combines Certified Organic Shea Butter with moisture-rich oils to use as hand lotion or body cream. Restore deep hydration to skin with this ultra-moisturizing skin moisturizer. You can also use it as a hand moisturizer, hydrating body lotion, foot lotion for dry skin or as a sensitive skin lotion every day. Smooth this lotion all over your skin after bath or shower, or use it as a massage cream. Thanks to our Shea Butter and moisture-rich oils, this dry skin lotion is one of the best body lotions for sensitive skin. SheaMoisture is known and loved for its natural, sustainably produced goodness. It's made with love for you. We are also pioneering Fair Trade through Community Commerce at home and abroad. With every purchase, you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities. Ethically traded ingredients sustainably produced. Pioneering Community Commerce and Fair Trade since 1912. Tested on the Tucker family for four generations. Never on animals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SheaMoisture 100% virgin coconut oil daily hydration bubble bath & body wash Smooth and hydrate skin with our multipurpose, rich and hydrating bubble bath and body wash. Exotic Acacia Senegal mixes with a luxurious blend of 100% Virgin Coconut Oil and Coconut Milk, to moisturize as it gently cleanses. Tested on the Tucker family for four generations. Never on animals. Exotic Acacia Senegal mixes with a luxurious blend of 100% Virgin Coconut Oil and Coconut Milk, to moisturize as it gently cleanses. Apply to washcloth or hands to cleanse entire body. For a luxurious spa bath add a capful to warm water and use a natural bath sponge

SheaMoisture Soothing Body Wash for Acne Treatment African Black Soap Paraben Free Body Wash SheaMoisture's African Black Soap Soothing Body Wash gently cleanses blemished prone skin. This black soap paraben free body wash is blended with Fair Trade Shea Butter, African Black Soap, Oats and Aloe. Apply this body wash cleanser to a washcloth or hands to cleanse entire body. We are sustainably produced goodness. This balancing wash, blended with African Black Soap, Oats, Aloe, and Fair Trade Shea Butter is a gentle skin cleanser and helps hydrate. African black soap is a time-honored beauty secret, and we've created our black soap body wash formula made from natural ingredients.

SheaMoisture Sensitive Skin Soothing Lotion African Black Soap Body Lotion SheaMoisture African Black Soap Soothing Body Lotion is a moisturizing lotion made with vitamins and is the best body lotion for dry skin. This body lotion for women is a paraben-free body lotion by SheaMoisture. This skin moisturizer combines Certified Organic Shea Butter with moisture-rich oils to use as hand lotion or body cream. Restore deep hydration to skin with this ultra-moisturizing skin moisturizer. You can also use it as a hand moisturizer, hydrating body lotion, foot lotion for dry skin or as a sensitive skin lotion every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use it every day
reviews.reviewText: I use this every day! No greasy after feel and it’s a nice pleasant smell. Great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This made my skin smooth and hydrated and clean ingredients are a big plus! Very important if you are conscious about the products that you choose

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First time using this product and I love it will be buying more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is good for really dry skin
reviews.reviewText: This works well if you have really dry skin. Most moisturizers on the market are just so full of fillers that there is little if anything in them to benefit the skin. This actually has useful ingredients! It actually helps smooth dry skin and make it normal again. I like the pump bottle. It works well until you get down to the last 1/3 to 1/4 of the bottle. Then you just cannot get it to pump out anymore. I cut the bottle apart and put what is left in another container. It might be better to sell this product in a jar. It really is more of a cream than a lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a great cream
reviews.reviewText: Great for my skin and helps me with my skin condition

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great hydrating lotion
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite body lotion. It is hydrating and keeps my dry skin happy. My entire family uses it and loves it. It does have a scent but I find it pleasant and it does go away after a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I came across this at Marshalls once and have been into this cream ever since. It's great for sensitive skin, very buttery and thick but it absorbs right away in front of you. I've been buying it regularly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inoffensive scent, very smooth
reviews.reviewText: I reorder this every time that I finish a unit. It's very smooth, doesn't upset my skin, and is a great, neutral scent.
